author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible to use the controller servlet as the target of a
controller servlet would mistakenly use the request URI of the original
request, rather than the included path, when calculating which action

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove "final" modifiers on tag classes, and change "private" instance
variables to "protected", to make it easier to subclass these tags to

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the Struts Example Application so that it uses only the new
(separated) custom tag libraries, rather than the old combined one.
The old combined library will remain in the Struts 1.0 distribution, but
it should be considered deprecated.  New development based on Struts
should use only the new tag libraries.

author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate the <struts:message> tag to the struts-bean library, and the
<struts:errors> and <struts:link> tags to the struts-form library (which
is now more generally focused on HTML presentations, not just forms.
